name: part_005
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠_NIGHT】ときのそら New Year’s Party 2026『Dreams in Motion』 [ko7ypXM_-yQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora performing her song 'Akira' (明ら) at her New Year’s Party 2026.
Tokino Sora performing her song 'Capillary' (キャピラリー) at her New Year’s Party 2026.

subtitles.original: 今日だけは一緒に泣いてもいいよ
subtitles.english: It's okay to cry together just for today

subtitles.original: だけど明日は自分を明るいヒトと書くようにしてね
subtitles.english: But from tomorrow, try to see yourself as a bright person

subtitles.original: 大きく歌って 歌って 君に届けたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to sing out loud, sing out, and reach you

subtitles.original: 夢を願って 願って 未来を見に行こうよ
subtitles.english: Wishing for dreams, wishing for dreams, let's go see the future

subtitles.original: 夢物語だって 晴れが向かい風だって
subtitles.english: Even if it's a fairy tale, even if the clear sky brings headwind

subtitles.original: 私たちを彩るVoiceだもん
subtitles.english: Because it's the voice that colors us

subtitles.original: キレイになって なって
subtitles.english: Becoming beautiful, beautiful...

subtitles.original: ちょびっと自信持ってね 誰だっていいよ
subtitles.english: Have a little confidence, it's okay for anyone

subtitles.original: 君と一緒に歌いたいだけだよ
subtitles.english: I just want to sing with you

subtitles.original: いつもよりも誰よりも想い出ギュッと抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Embracing memories more tightly than usual, than anyone

subtitles.original: 魔法をかけるよ さあ
subtitles.english: I'll cast a spell, now!

subtitles.original: せーの！ もっと！ もっと！
subtitles.english: One, two! More! More!

subtitles.original: せーの！ もっと！ もっと！
subtitles.english: One, two! More! More!

subtitles.original: はい！ はい！ はい！ はい！
subtitles.english: Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai!

subtitles.original: したたに したたに しつこくまたまた手探る
subtitles.english: Stubbornly, stubbornly, persistently groping my way again

subtitles.original: アンチなリズムを そうか 倒しちゃうの
subtitles.english: So, are you going to defeat that anti-rhythm?

subtitles.original: 見過ごし千花だ シルエット 見え隠れしたそのモーション
subtitles.english: Silhouette of a thousand flowers overlooked, that motion seen and hidden

subtitles.original: コジツケされた 悪い悪い子まで
subtitles.english: Even to the bad, bad children who were forced along

subtitles.original: 一連にユラユラ 開始の合図 狂うか 回れ 言い止まれよ
subtitles.english: Swaying in succession, the signal to start. Go mad or spin, stop saying it

subtitles.original: あっちのほうで踊りましょう 唇そのうちに
subtitles.english: Let's dance over there, before the lips speak

subtitles.original: もっと頂戴
subtitles.english: Give me more

subtitles.original: 響かせたい歌いだけなの 揺れるこのキャピラリー
subtitles.english: I just want to sing and make it ring out, this swaying capillary

subtitles.original: 霧の中 歌いだけなの 過ごした道 披露
subtitles.english: I just want to sing in the fog, showing the path I've walked

subtitles.original: ひとつでしょうか 星が満ちてる 砂利を伝えたいかな
subtitles.english: Is it just one? The stars are full. Do I want to convey the gravel?

subtitles.original: 君には容赦しないわ さあ
subtitles.english: I won't go easy on you, come on!

subtitles.original: いなーい いなーい ばあ 捨てちゃえば またまた遊びましょう
subtitles.english: Peek-a-boo, if you throw it away, let's play again

subtitles.original: 終わり切れない感情 瞳の中で見ててててて
subtitles.english: Unending emotions, look into my eyes

subtitles.original: 大概な時 大概な時 コツコツ振り絞って情緒は
subtitles.english: Most of the time, most of the time, bit by bit wringing out emotions

subtitles.original: どうしようかな どうしようかな 暗い暗い夜の中
subtitles.english: What should I do? What should I do? In the dark, dark night

subtitles.original: 音がもしも 私の世界に舞い落ちて
subtitles.english: If sound should flutter down into my world

subtitles.original: キレイになって そうでしょう
subtitles.english: It would become beautiful, wouldn't it?

subtitles.original: 響かせたい歌いだけなの 揺れるこのキャピラリー
subtitles.english: I just want to sing and make it ring out, this swaying capillary

subtitles.original: 霧で満たした歌いだけなの 作用する新しわ
subtitles.english: I just want to sing filled with fog, a new action

subtitles.original: 待ってたはずよ 星が満ちてる 砂利を伝えたいかな
subtitles.english: I must have been waiting. The stars are full. Do I want to convey the gravel?

subtitles.original: 秘密に会う術で 手を合わせ踊りましょう
subtitles.english: With a secret way to meet, let's put our hands together and dance

subtitles.original: いらない真実は 忘れさせてあげるから
subtitles.english: Because I'll make you forget the truths you don't need

subtitles.original: 情熱を駆け引きに ずっと向いてなよ
subtitles.english: Keep facing the passion in the bargaining

subtitles.original: 響かせたい歌いだけなの あれもこれも全部全部
subtitles.english: I just want to sing and make it ring out, all of that and all of this

subtitles.original: 霧で満たした歌いだけなの 譲らない始めましょう
subtitles.english: I just want to sing filled with fog, I won't give in, let's begin

subtitles.original: 響かせたい歌いだけなの 揺れるこのキャピラリー
subtitles.english: I just want to sing and make it ring out, this swaying capillary

subtitles.original: 霧で満たした歌いだけなの 過ごした道 披露
subtitles.english: I just want to sing filled with fog, showing the path I've walked

subtitles.original: ひとつでしょうか 星が満ちてる 砂利を伝えたいかな
subtitles.english: Is it just one? The stars are full. Do I want to convey the gravel?

subtitles.original: 君には容赦しないわ 届いた先に愛を
subtitles.english: I won't go easy on you, love at the destination of what reached you
